short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes.








































pandora.com is a simple and intuitive Chrome extension that allows you to adjust the brightness of the pandora.com website using an easy-to-use slider. With this extension, you can customize the website's brightness to suit your preferences, enhancing your browsing comfort, especially in low-light conditions,

Features:

Brightness Adjustment: Use the slider to easily change the brightness level of the pandora.com website from 10% to 100%, allowing you to tailor visibility to your needs.
Quick Access: The extension is easily accessible directly from the browser toolbar. Click the icon to open the slider in a popup window, enabling quick brightness adjustments.
this is not an official pandora extension
